net.asrex.skillful.skill

Class SkillDefinition

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.asrex.skillful.skill.SkillDefinition

  • public class SkillDefinition
extends java.lang.Object
    A skill definition as read from a the configuration file.

        public boolean satisfiesRequirements(net.minecraft.entity.player.EntityPlayer player,
                            PlayerSkillInfo info)

      • matchesSeed

        public boolean matchesSeed(java.lang.String event)
        Determines if the given token string matches any seed string associated with this skill definition.
        Parameters:
        event - the event string to search for
        Returns:
        true if any seeds for this skill match the event string, false otherwise

      • getEventValue

        public int getEventValue(java.lang.String event)
        Gets the best seed value for the given event, or 0 if no seeds match the given event string. If multiple seeds match, the seed with the highest value is selected.
        Parameters:
        event - the event string to search for
        Returns:
        the best event value, or 0

      • getProgressForLevel

        public int getProgressForLevel(int level)
        Gets the maximum progress for the given level, based on the current ScalingStrategy.
        Parameters:
        level - the level to get the max progress for
        Returns:
        the maximum progress for the given level
        See Also:
        ScalingStrategy.getProgressForLevel(int)

      • createSkill

        public Skill createSkill()
        A basic factory for Skill objects. Subclasses could potentially override this method should they wish to create their own Skill derivatives.
        Returns:
        a new Skill object for this SkillDefinition.
